resources.string: If you need help, click to the help menu

To change the color, press the paint palette and choose the color you want. 

To change the size of the brush, press the pot with the brushes and choose the size you want. 

If you want to change the color of the background, select a color and then press the paint bucket or go to the menu and press Fill Color. 

If you want to erase part of your drawing, choose Erase from the menu. 

You can repeat your drawing as many times as you want by going to the menu and choose Clear all. 

If you want to save your drawing on your phone, just go to the menu and choose Save.
